item.description:
As you may have noticed, I'm on a mission to find places to drink outside. The Landing is Boston's only completely outdoor waterfront bar!

The Landing offers bowl drinks and specialty frozen drinks.

Check out their website for more info:

http://www.thelanding...

I'll wear a GREEN shirt. I'm asking everyone to wear something GREEN, so that it'll be easy to find the group.

There will be no group tab. Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go. People will be arriving and leaving at different times, so a group tab does not work out well.

I'll get there around 5:15pm and I'll stay for a couple of hours; however feel free to come and go as you please.

This date, June 25th, would have been my 20th wedding anniversary. So, I'll drink to that! lol

RAIN CANCELS! This bar is all outdoors. I'll reschedule if the weather is questionable.

Also, The Landing does not serve food; however, they will let you bring in take-out food from nearby restaurants to eat at their bar and tables.

See ya there! Wear GREEN!!!

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a GREEN shirt. I'm asking everyone to wear something GREEN. So, look for the group of people wearing GREEN clothing!
item.name: The Landing - Boston's Only Completely Outdoor Waterfront Bar - Wear GREEN!!!
